name: Peppermill Deluxe King Room
description: Peppermill's spacious Deluxe King Rooms set the standard for lodging in Northern Nevada and are consistently voted one of the best Reno hotel rooms, ranking Peppermill's guest rooms in the top tier of Nevada hotels. Plush double pillow-top mattresses, luxurious triple sheeting, and a full suite of modern amenities.
shortDescription: Award-winning Peppermill Deluxe King Rooms — voted top-tier Nevada hotel rooms year after year.

faqs.question: What's included in the Peppermill Deluxe King Room?
faqs.answer: Plush pillow-top king bed, triple sheeting, 42" HDTV, Keurig, in-room safe, and 24-hour room service.

faqs.question: Are group rates available?
faqs.answer: Yes — Golf the High Sierra negotiates block rates for golf groups at Peppermill including Deluxe King Rooms.

testimonials.quote: Best standard hotel room I've stayed in Reno. The Peppermill Deluxe King is seriously comfortable — the mattress alone is worth it.
testimonials.author: Greg H.

testimonials.quote: Voted best for a reason. Clean, comfortable, and the GTHS group rate made it incredible value for our golf trip.
testimonials.author: Eric B.
